title: What can I do if my phone experiences lags when playing online music or videos?
answer:
l   The Wi-Fi network connection may be unstable.

If you are connected to a Wi-Fi network, check whether you are within the coverage of the Wi-Fi hotspot device, or contact your Wi-Fi service provider.

l   The mobile data reception may be poor.

If you are using a mobile data connection, move your phone to a place with good reception and try again.

l   Your phone may not have sufficient storage.

On the **Phone Manager** screen, touch **Phone accelerator** > **Storage cleaner** > **Smart scan**, and follow the onscreen instructions to perform a smart scan, and clear the application cache, system trash files, applications you no longer need and their installation packages, and large files, such as videos and compressed packages.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208144925572003.png)

The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary.
